typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	FileName as string ('0030_SourceData1.csv'),
	SchemaName as string ('utils'),
	ViewName as string ('vw_0030_SourceData1.csv-2019-11-01T15:17:40.927'),
	DataFactoryName as string ('xxx'),
	DataFactoryPipelineName as string ('yyyy'),
	DataFactoryPipelineRunID as string ('zzzzz'),
	StorageAccountName as string ('4swyu27nfq4ta')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> ReadFromCSVInBlobStorage
ReadFromCSVInBlobStorage derive({__FileName} = $FileName,
		{__StorageAccountName} = $StorageAccountName,
		{__DataFactoryName} = $DataFactoryName,
		{__DataFactoryPipelineName} = $DataFactoryPipelineName,
		{__DataFactoryPipelineRunId} = $DataFactoryPipelineRunID,
		{__InsertDateTimeUTC} = currentUTC()) ~> EnrichWithDataFactoryMetadata
EnrichWithDataFactoryMetadata sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> WriteToTargetSqlTable

resources.name: [concat(parameters('dataFactoryName'), '/Import Blob Storage Account Key CSV file into generic SQL table using Copy Activity Logging to Target SQL Server')]

dependsOn.activity: Get Target View Schema and Name
Log Start

activities.name: Get Target View Schema and Name

dependsOn.activity: Get CSV file Structure
Log Success - Copy from Source to Sink

SourceName.value: Drop file to generic SQL Sink

value.value:
@concat(
   'End of pipeline - ', 
   'DataFactory:(', pipeline().DataFactory,'), ', 
   'Pipeline:(', pipeline().Pipeline, '), ', 
   'PipelineRunID:(', pipeline().RunId, '), ', 
   'PipelineTriggerID:(', pipeline().TriggerId, '), ', 
   'PipelineTriggerName:(', pipeline().TriggerName, '), ', 
   'PipelineTriggerTime:(', pipeline().TriggerTime, '), ', 
   'PipelineTriggerType:(', pipeline().TriggerType, '), ', 
   'FileName:(', pipeline().parameters.FileName, '), ', 
   'StorageAccountName: (', pipeline().parameters.StorageAccountName, ')'
)

SourceName.value: Drop file to generic SQL Sink

value.value:
@concat(
   'Start of pipeline - ', 
   'DataFactory:(', pipeline().DataFactory,'), ', 
   'Pipeline:(', pipeline().Pipeline, '), ', 
   'PipelineRunID:(', pipeline().RunId, '), ', 
   'PipelineTriggerID:(', pipeline().TriggerId, '), ', 
   'PipelineTriggerName:(', pipeline().TriggerName, '), ', 
   'PipelineTriggerTime:(', pipeline().TriggerTime, '), ', 
   'PipelineTriggerType:(', pipeline().TriggerType, '), ', 
   'FileName:(', pipeline().parameters.FileName, '), ', 
   'StorageAccountName: (', pipeline().parameters.StorageAccountName, ')'
)

dependsOn.activity: Get CSV file Structure

SourceName.value: Drop file to generic SQL Sink/Get CSV file Structure

value.value:
@concat(
   'Error in pipeline - ', 
   'DataFactory:(', pipeline().DataFactory,'), ', 
   'Pipeline:(', pipeline().Pipeline, '), ', 
   'FileName:(', pipeline().parameters.FileName, '), ', 
   'ActivityName:(', 'Get CSV file Structure', '), ', 
   'RuntimeError:(', activity('Get CSV file Structure').Error,'), ', 
   'SchemaName:(), ', 
   'TableName:()'
)

activities.name: Log Error - Get Target Schema and Name

dependsOn.activity: Get Target View Schema and Name

SourceName.value: Drop file to generic SQL Sink/Get Target Table Schema and Name

value.value:
@concat(
   'Error in pipeline - ', 
   'DataFactory:(', pipeline().DataFactory,'), ', 
   'Pipeline:(', pipeline().Pipeline, '), ', 
   'FileName:(', pipeline().parameters.FileName, '), ', 
   'ActivityName:(', 'Get Target View Schema and Name', '), ', 
   'RuntimeError:(', activity('Get Target View Schema and Name').output.error,'), ', 
   'SchemaName:(), ', 
   'TableName:()'
)

   'Success in pipeline activity - ',

value.value:

   'Success in pipeline activity - ', 
   'DataFactory:(', pipeline().DataFactory,'), ', 
   'Pipeline:(', pipeline().Pipeline, '), ', 
   'FileName:(', pipeline().parameters.FileName, '), ', 
   'ActivityName:(', 'Copy from Source to Sink', '), ',

)

resources.name: [concat(parameters('dataFactoryName'), '/Import Blob Storage Account Key CSV file into generic SQL table using Data Flow Activity Logging to Target SQL Server')]

dependsOn.activity: Log Start - WriteToOperationsEventLog

activities.name: Get Target View Schema and Name

dependsOn.activity: Get CSV file Structure

activities.name: Copy Generic CSV Source to Generic SQL Sink

dependsOn.activity: Get Target View Schema and Name
Get CSV file Structure

body.value:
{
	"EventDateTime":"@{utcNow()}",
	"EventState":"Error",
	"SourceName":"@{concat(pipeline().DataFactory, '/', pipeline().Pipeline, '/Get CSV file Structure')}",
	"SourceType":"DataFactoryPipelineRunActivity",
	"StatusMessage":"{
		\"EventType\": \"DataFactoryPipelineRunActivity\", 
		\"DataFactoryName\":\"@{pipeline().DataFactory}\",
		\"DataFactoryPipelineName\":\"@{pipeline().Pipeline}\",
		\"DataFactoryPipelineActivityName\":\"Get CSV file Structure\",
		\"DataFactoryPipelineActivityError\":\"@{replace(string(activity('Get CSV file Structure').error), '"', '')}\",
		\"DataFactoryPipelineRunID\":\"@{pipeline().RunID}\",
		\"DataFactoryPipelineTriggerName\":\"@{pipeline().TriggerName}\",
		\"DataFactoryPipelineTriggerType\":\"@{pipeline().TriggerType}\",
		\"DataFactoryPipelineTriggerTime\":\"@{pipeline().TriggerTime}\",
		\"Parameters\":{
			\"StorageAccountName\":\"@{pipeline().parameters.StorageAccountName}\", 
			\"FileName\":\"@{pipeline().parameters.FileName}\",
			\"TargetSQLServerName\":\"@{pipeline().parameters.TargetSQLServerName}\", 
			\"TargetSQLDatabaseName\":\"@{pipeline().parameters.TargetSQLDatabaseName}\", 
			\"TargetSQLUsername\":\"@{pipeline().parameters.TargetSQLUsername}\"
		}
	}"
}

dependsOn.activity: Get Target View Schema and Name

	"SourceType":"DataFactoryPipelineRunActivity",

		\"DataFactoryPipelineName\":\"@{pipeline().Pipeline}\",
		\"DataFactoryPipelineActivityName\":\"Get Target View Schema and Name\",
		\"DataFactoryPipelineActivityOutput\":\"@{replace(string(activity('Get Target View Schema and Name').output), '"', '')}\",		\"DataFactoryPipelineRunID\":\"@{pipeline().RunID}\",
		\"DataFactoryPipelineTriggerName\":\"@{pipeline().TriggerName}\",
		\"DataFactoryPipelineTriggerType\":\"@{pipeline().TriggerType}\",

			\"TargetSQLUsername\":\"@{pipeline().parameters.TargetSQLUsername}\"
		}, 
		\"InterimValues\":{
			\"SchemaName\":\"@{activity('Get Target View Schema and Name').output.firstRow.SchemaName}\",

	}"
}
